info.title: Microsoft Graph API for Group Management
info.description: API endpoints for managing groups in Microsoft Graph.

get.description: Retrieve a list of directory audit objects.

schema.example: activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/type eq 'User') and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq '<group-id>' and r/type eq 'Group')

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Show only the first n items.

200.description: If successful, this method returns a 200 OK response code and a collection of directory audit objects in the response body.

examples.summary: When was the last user added to a group?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/type eq 'User') and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq '<group-id>' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc&$top=1

examples.summary: Who added users to a group?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/type eq 'User') and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq '<group-id>' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc&$top=5

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieve a list of deleted group objects.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Show only the first n items.

200.description: If successful, this method returns a 200 OK response code and a collection of deleted group objects in the response body.

examples.summary: Get last 10 deleted groups

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Include a count of the total number of items in the collection.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Show only the first n items.

parameters.name: $search
parameters.description: Search for items by property values.

examples.summary: Get all groups with WriteBack enabled

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/groups?$count=true&$filter=writebackConfiguration/isEnabled eq true or (writebackConfiguration/isEnabled ne false and groupTypes/any(x:x eq 'Unified'))&$select=id,displayName,description,mail,groupTypes,securityEnabled,createdDateTime,writebackConfiguration

examples.summary: Get all groups with WriteBack disabled

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/groups?$count=true&$filter=writebackConfiguration/isEnabled eq false or (writebackConfiguration/isEnabled ne true and not (groupTypes/any(x:x eq 'Unified')))&$select=id,displayName,description,mail,groupTypes,securityEnabled,createdDateTime,writebackConfiguration

scopes.https://graph.microsoft.com/.default: Access Microsoft Graph using application or delegated permissions

id.description: The unique identifier for the directory audit log.

correlationId.description: The correlation ID for the activity.

activityDisplayName.description: The display name of the activity.

activityDateTime.description: The date and time when the activity occurred.

loggedByService.description: The service that logged the activity.

id.description: The unique identifier for the user.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name of the user.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the user.

app.description: The application that initiated the activity.

id.description: The unique identifier for the target resource.

displayName.description: The display name of the target resource.

Type.description: The type of the target resource.

displayName.description: The display name of the modified property.

oldValue.description: The old value of the modified property.

newValue.description: The new value of the modified property.

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name of the target resource.

key.description: The key of the additional detail.

value.description: The value of the additional detail.

id.description: The unique identifier for the group.

displayName.description: The display name of the group.

mail.description: The email address of the group.

securityEnabled.description: Indicates whether the group is security-enabled.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time the group was created.

expirationDateTime.description: The date and time the group will expire.

id.description: The unique identifier for the role or group.

displayName.description: The display name of the role or group.

description.description: The description of the role or group.

id.description: The unique identifier for the role.

displayName.description: The display name of the role.

id.description: The unique identifier for the role assignment.
The unique identifier for the role definition.

displayName.description: The display name of the role definition.

description.description: The description of the role definition.

id.description: The unique identifier for the group.

displayName.description: The display name of the group.

mail.description: The email address of the group.

securityEnabled.description: Indicates whether the group is a security group.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time the group was created.
